dct_title_s: Deutschland und Nachbarländer  / Kartographie un Druck von Georg Westermann.
dct_description_sm: Recto: Political map showing Germany1936, and 1945-1990 boundaries;  demarcation line of the free city of Denzig, and the Oder-Neiße-Linie a  provisional border between Poland and Germany in the 1945 Potsdam Agreement, with parts of Germany placed under Polish administration. The Soviet Union played a crucial role in enforcing this demarcation and supported Poland in securing its new western border. Physical map shows relief by gradient tints, hachures, and spot heights.
